description: This file defines API route handlers for managing content items in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting content, utilizing dependency injection for the content service.

methods.name: get_content_service
methods.description: Provides a ContentService instance, backed by MongoDB, injected as a dependency into route handlers.

methods.name: list_content
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list content items with pagination.

methods.name: get_content
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific content item by ID.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create new content items.

methods.name: update_content
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing content item by ID.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete a content item by ID.
